page.title: 20Housing
page.content: We went down the road and we saw some breeze blocks and they came in 4 different sizes, 50 75 100 150. Then we saw some foundations with water inside and out. Later they'll fill them in with 6-8 metres of concrete. Then we saw a man who was going to put some tiles on the roof. Next we went into a house which wasn't anywhere near built. We went up some stairs and there was a man with a chain saw. The men showed us how the floorboards fit together. It was a bit like a jig-saw. In the next house there was a man working on the ceiling with Artex and he was doing a pattern called Broken Leather. Then we saw a forklift truck which lifted some breeze blocks as high as the chimney. In the next house it was nearly finished and everything was fitted. Tina Singh Age 8
